column4: Description
Defines  the requested action (e.g. earmark for future allocation, allocate or recall an allocation of a collateral asset)
Reference to the product to which the collateral is allocated
Reference to a offer process during which the collateral allocation is defined and agreed
Applies for initial earmarking of collateral during an offer process
Time for which the earmarking is enforced
The amount of the overall asset value that is allocated in this instance
The intended duration of the allocation (can be finite or open ended)
Applies when part or all of the allocation is recalled (e.g. due to revaluation of the asset)
The schedule for processing allocation recall
The result of the allocation recall
State of the allocation as there can be different states for the allocation of a single asset to several products
Record of the workstep and result of the allocation process

Collateral Allocation Management: CR Collateral Asset Allocation Instance Record
CR Collateral Asset Allocation Instance Record
column4: Reference to the title owner of the collateral asset

Collateral Allocation Management: CR Collateral Asset Allocation Instance Record
column4: The type of asset (e.g. building, machinery, inventory, financial instrument, art)

Collateral Allocation Management: CR Collateral Asset Allocation Instance Record
column4: Reference to the collateral item (e.g. address, account reference)

Collateral Allocation Management: CR Collateral Asset Allocation Instance Record
column4: Description of significant details and properties of the asset

Collateral Allocation Management: CR Collateral Asset Allocation Instance Record
column4: Reference to the administration record of the asset item

Collateral Allocation Management: CR Collateral Asset Allocation Instance Record
column4: A general status indicator for the asset (can cover multiple properties as needed)

Collateral Allocation Management: CR Collateral Asset Allocation Instance Record
column4: The current and historical valuation of the asset

Collateral Allocation Management: CR Collateral Asset Allocation Instance Record
column4: A record of past and current allocations of the collateral asset

Collateral Allocation Management: CR Collateral Asset Allocation Instance Record
column4: The date of the last valuation (and next planned valuation)

Collateral Allocation Management: CR Collateral Asset Allocation Instance Record
column3: Collateral Asset Loan to Value Ratio
column4: The ratio of the valuation that can be used as collateral (depends on liquidity, title, etc.)
